TopicTitle: Thrustmaster T.Flight Stick X joystick mapping?

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbonauts!

I have an old thrustmaster tflight stick x joystick. 

I have tried in various ways to make it work for ksp, but found none achieved any result. 

It has SDL and works flawlessly with windows flight simulator. 

Is there any program to let me map it to ksp or mod? I tried "advanced fly by wire'' but with no results.

Any suggestion would be great. Thank you for your time.

Edited November 7, 2018 by sumghai
Clarified thread title
